"Welcome to the Pika Seeker Game!
" "There are many pikachu playing a game of hide and seek in the Poke-Universe. Your mission is to try and locate all of them by tapping on a cell! Once you tap on a cell, a scan is activated, showing the number of Pikachu hiding in the row and column! Try to get the least amount of scans while locating all of the Pikachu to win the game! Good luck!"
